data.title: 2 Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks to Buy Before They Soar to $2 Trillion, According to Wall Street Analysts
data.description: Certain Wall Street analysts expect Broadcom and Meta Platforms to join Nvidia, Apple, Alphabet, Microsoft, and Amazon in the $2 trillion club.
data.keywords: artificial intelligence, Scott Devitt, Wall Street, Meta Platforms, Broadcom, Wedbush, AI accelerators
